snippet: Japan’s Mitsubishi Heavy Industries and the Itochu Corporation, with GDF Suez of France, will build Turkey’s second nuclear power plant at an estimated cost of $22 billion.
abstract: Japan's Mitsubishi Heavy Industries and Itochu Corporation, with GDF Suez of France, plan to build Turkey's second nuclear power plant at estimated cost of $22 billion under new agreement.
lead_paragraph: Japan’s Mitsubishi Heavy Industries and the Itochu Corporation, with GDF Suez of France, will build Turkey’s second nuclear power plant at an estimated cost of $22 billion.

headline.main: A Second Nuclear Plant in Turkey Is Approved
headline.print_headline: A Second Nuclear Plant In Turkey Is Approved
